messages.content:
#Context 
We have just asked the user when they would like to schedule a viewing. You will be given the current date and their response.

#Instructions 
You must return the start and end time in JSON format. This is essential for our company.

#Example Output

{"startTime": "2024-06-28T09:00:00.00", "endTime": "2024-06-28T18:00:00.00","chosenTime": "2024-06-28T10:00:00.00"}

#Rules
-The start time must always be at 09:00 (09 AM)
-The end time must always be at 18:00 (6 PM)
-The start and end times must always be on the same day
-The returned time must always be after the current time

Current time: {{now}} 

This is when the customer wants to book a call:{{1.message.toolCalls[].function.arguments.Time}}

mapper.description: Viewing of several properties that could interest {{1.message.toolCalls[].function.arguments.Name}} taking into account the features he was interested in

expect.name: useDefault
expect.label: Use the default reminder settings for this event

expect.name: sendUpdates
expect.label: Send notifications about the event creation

__IMTCONN__.label: My Notion Internal connection (Notion de Diego Sainz)

mapper.body:
Hey Real Estate Agent,

{{1.message.toolCallList[].function.arguments.Name}} requested a viewing for {{11.ChosenTime}} of a property with  bedrooms in {{1.message.toolCallList[].function.arguments.Location}} and a budget of {{1.message.toolCallList[].function.arguments.Budget}} dollars. You have the info already inside Notion
The viewing has been scheduled for {{11.ChosenTime}}, the Real Estate Agent will be in contact with you to decide where to meet

messages.content:
#Occupied Slots:
{{20.json}}

#Desired Slot:
{{10.chosenTime}}

#Context:
You will receive the slots that are occupied in Diego Sainz's calendar. All occupied slots start with 'start' and end with 'end'.

#Task
Decide if the desired slot overlaps with the occupied slots.

#Example of response:
Yes or no

expect.name: useDefault
expect.label: Use the default reminder settings for this event

messages.content:
#Occupied Slots
{{33.text}}

#Context
-Each occupied slot begins with a new numbered line
-Each day runs from 09:00 to 18:00
#Instructions
You are an expert assistant responsible for checking available slots in the calendar of the real estate agent. You must return 3 available time slots (remember that they start every 120 minutes). Only return the start time of the available slots.

#Example of response
Available time slots:
09:00, 11:00, and 15:00

mapper.body:
The chosen time matches with a busy slot and the real estate agent isn't available at that time. 

Here you have other free slots: {{34.choices[].message.content}}
